title: Metal-free and natural dye sensitized solar cells: Recent advancement and future perspectives
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Sumit Sahil Malhotra, Mukhtar Ahmed, Manoj K. Gupta, Azaj Ansari
Currently, the predominant energy source utilized by humanity is fossil fuels. However, as demand surges and supplies wane, identifying alternative sources of energy becomes increasingly critical. Solar energy has emerged...
